name: A Halloween Walk
description:
A festive Halloween practice exercise in art direction and level design

Created by Lydia/Funionnn

Click here to explore within the comfort of your browser 

Please enjoy exploring this haunting Halloween environment!

Use WASD to navigate

This is primarily an art test. Please check back this winter for a more interactive Christmas experience!

Audio made possible by contributors to OpenGameArt.org

Carousel theme: Childhood Flavours by Cleyton Kauffman

Snowfall by  Joseph Gilbert / Kistol

Wind sounds by IgnasD
